mapper.select: select rownum, r.recipe_num as recipeNum, r.user_num as userNum, r.title as title, r.score as score, r.read_count as readCount, to_char(r.indate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as indate from recipe_table r where rownum between 1 and #{countPerPage } order by r.recipe_num desc

select recipe_num as recipeNum, user_num as userNum, title as title, score as score, to_char(indate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as indate from recipe_table where title like '%'||#{searchword }||'%' order by recipe_num desc

select re.* from( select recipe_num as recipeNum, user_num as userNum, title as title, content as content, read_count as readCount, score as score, indate as indate, LAG(recipe_num,1,-1) OVER(ORDER BY recipe_num ASC) as prev, LEAD(recipe_num,1,-1) OVER(ORDER BY recipe_num ASC) as next from recipe_table) re where re.recipeNum = #{recipeNum }
mapper.update: update recipe_table set read_count = read_count + 1 where recipe_num = #{recipeNum }
